item.title: 中国经济放缓，太古罕见裁员数十人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，太古集团将在香港总部裁员约 10%，因为这家英国企业集团希望在中国经济放缓的情况下精简业务。【原文：Swire Group is laying off roughly 10% of employees at its Hong Kong head office, according to people familiar with the matter, as the British conglomerate seeks to streamline operations amid China’s economic slowdown.】

item.title: 软银从峰值下滑 40% 显示对巨额 OpenAI 赌注的担忧
item.description: 对人工智能估值过高的不安情绪日益加剧，这对软银集团公司的股价构成了压力，交易商越来越多地将软银集团公司视为私人控股公司OpenAI的代表。【原文：Growing unease over frothy artificial intelligence valuations is weighing on shares of SoftBank Group Corp., which traders increasingly view as a proxy for privately held OpenAI.】

item.title: 印度散户投资者抛售股票创 2023 年以来之最
item.description: 由于对经济增长的担忧挥之不去，而昂贵的估值又影响了市场情绪，印度的散户交易商对股票转为谨慎。【原文：India’s retail traders are turning cautious on equities as growth concerns linger while expensive valuations are denting sentiment.】

item.title: 优步机器人出租车合作伙伴 WeRide 在阿布扎比岛实现无人驾驶
item.description:
在推出安全运营商一年后，这两家公司将在 12 平方英里的区域内提供无人驾驶乘车服务。【原文：

A year after launching with safety operators on board, the two will offer driverless rides in a 12-square-mile area.

】

item.title: 英国重要预算案公布前英镑上涨
麦肯锡裁减约 200 个技术岗位，将更多角色转向人工智能
item.description: 麦肯锡咨询公司（McKinsey & Co.【原文：McKinsey & Co. cut about 200 global tech jobs in the past week as the consulting firm joins rivals in using artificial intelligence to automate some positions.】

item.title: 澳大利亚建筑活动跃升，努力缓解住房压力
item.description: 截至 9 月份的三个月中，澳大利亚的建筑活动有所回升，凸显了政府为解决千载难逢的住房短缺问题所做的努力，同时也为经济增长提供了动力。【原文：Australia’s building activity picked up in the three months through September, highlighting the government’s push to tackle a once-in-a-generation housing shortage and offering a boost to economic growth.】

item.title: 新加坡公司的人工智能泰迪熊在惊爆性话题后重新开售
item.description: 研究人员发现，新加坡一家公司销售的一款人工智能泰迪熊在未经提示的情况下聊起了性癖好和其他不适宜的话题，之后这款泰迪熊重新上架销售。【原文：An artificial intelligence-enabled teddy bear sold by a Singapore-based company is back on the shelves after researchers discovered it chats unprompted about sexual fetishes and other unsuitable topics.】

item.title: 恒大清盘人赢得对许家印前妻更广泛的资产冻结
item.description: 香港法院扩大了针对中国恒大集团创始人许家印前妻的禁令范围，增加了她在加拿大、直布罗陀、泽西岛和新加坡的 2.2 亿美元资产。【原文：A Hong Kong court has broadened an injunction against the ex-wife of China Evergrande Group founder Hui Ka Yan, adding $220 million in assets across Canada, Gibraltar, Jersey and Singapore.】

item.title: Bidvest 董事的奥运之旅引发股东质疑
item.description: 南非企业集团 Bidvest Group Ltd. 在要求股东同意为其董事长和两名非执行董事的巴黎奥运之旅提供资金后，不得不向股东作出解释。【原文：South African conglomerate Bidvest Group Ltd. is having to explain itself to shareholders after asking them to endorse the bankrolling of a Paris Olympics trip for its chairman and two non-executive directors.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金以 2.53 亿美元出售麦加开发商股份
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金通过减持一家位于麦加的房地产开发商的股份筹集了约 2.53 亿美元，该公司已成为沙特阿拉伯今年表现最好的股票上市公司。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund raised about $253 million by trimming its stake in a Mecca-based property developer that’s become the kingdom’s best-performing equity listing this year.】

item.title: 当里夫斯停止讲话时，英国金边债券市场才会做出反应
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将其预算案的成功与否部分寄希望于债券市场的反应，但历史表明，匆忙判断她是否成功可能是不明智的。【原文：UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves has partly pinned the success of her budget to the reaction in bond markets, but history suggests it might be unwise to rush to a judgment on whether she has succeeded.】

item.title: 阿联酋将非洲贸易作为粮食安全和高增长率的目标
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国是撒哈拉以南非洲仅次于中国的最大贸易伙伴，该国一位部长表示，阿联酋计划进一步扩大与该地区的贸易，因为阿联酋寻求加强粮食安全并利用非洲一些经济体的快速增长。【原文：The United Arab Emirates, sub-Saharan Africa’s biggest trade partner after China, plans to further expand commerce with the region as it seeks to bolster food security and tap into rapid growth of some African economies, a minister said.】

item.title: 花旗聘用野村和富国交易员，在亚洲推广外汇业务
item.description: 花旗集团聘用了七名员工，包括野村国际（Nomura International）和富国银行（Wells Fargo）的前交易员，以加强其在亚洲的外汇业务。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has hired seven personnel, including former traders from Nomura International and Wells Fargo, to boost its foreign-exchange business in Asia.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德和 GIC 以 26 亿美元竞购 National Storage
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. ）和新加坡 GIC 私人有限公司（GIC Pte）提出收购在悉尼上市的国家仓储房地产投资信托公司（National Storage REIT），该交易对自助仓储供应商的估值为 40.2 亿澳元（26.1 亿美元）。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. and Singapore’s GIC Pte offered to buy Sydney-listed National Storage REIT in a deal valuing the self-storage provider at A$4.02 billion ($2.61 billion).】

item.title: 我们需要谈谈美联储的凯文-哈塞特
item.description:
在某些时候，他需要树立一种独立于特朗普的形象。【原文：

At some point, he’ll need to establish a perception of independence from Trump.

】

item.title: 通胀放缓，加纳将迎来第三次大幅降息：日间指南
item.description: 加纳央行可能将连续第三次大幅降息，因为预计到年底通胀率将低于其目标区间的下限。【原文：Ghana’s central bank will likely deliver a third consecutive big interest-rate cut as inflation is projected to fall below the lower end of its target range by year-end.】

item.title: 软银 5000 亿日元债券提供 2010 年以来最高日元收益率
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）将向散户投资者融资约 5000 亿日元（32 亿美元），票面利率为 3.98%；这是该公司 15 年来日元计价优先债券的最高利率。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. will raise about ¥500 billion ($3.2 billion) from retail investors at a coupon of 3.98% — the highest on a yen-denominated senior bond from the company in 15 years.】

item.title: 受 Codelco 公司报价和美元下跌影响，铜价再次走高
item.description: 由于智利生产商 Codelco 推动大幅提高其年度溢价，以及美元走弱使金属更具吸引力，铜价上涨。【原文：Copper rose as Chilean producer Codelco pushed for a huge hike in its annual premium and a weaker dollar made metals more attractive.】

item.title: Nio 股价下跌，前景黯淡，难以实现盈亏平衡
item.description: Nio Inc. 的股价暴跌，原因是这家汽车制造商对第四季度的展望令人失望，加剧了投资者对其能否在行业竞争加剧的情况下实现盈亏平衡目标的担忧。【原文：Nio Inc. shares tumbled after the carmaker’s disappointing outlook for the fourth quarter fueled investor concerns about its ability to reach a break-even target as industry competition intensifies.】

item.title: 日本 40 年期债券销售需求略高于平均水平
item.description: 尽管日本首相佐那江隆一的经济刺激计划引发了持续的财政忧虑，但日本 40 年期国债收益率的上升还是吸引了一些投资者，因此周三的国债拍卖需求略高于 12 个月的平均水平。【原文：Japan’s 40-year government bond auction Wednesday saw demand that was slightly higher than the 12-month average as an increase in yields attracted some investors despite ongoing fiscal worries spurred by Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s stimulus package.】

item.title: 感恩节晚餐价格上涨源于供应冲击而非关税
item.description: 据彭博经济报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税并不是美国感恩节大餐价格加速上涨的主要催化剂，供应中断发挥了更大的作用。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs aren’t the main catalyst for accelerating Thanksgiving feast prices in the US, with supply disruptions playing a bigger role, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 司法部在递解出境藐视法庭案中确认美国高官身份
item.description: 特朗普政府指认了参与决定不按法官命令调转 3 月份被驱逐移民飞机的美国高级官员，其中包括国土安全部长克里斯蒂-诺姆（Kristi Noem）、司法部副部长托德-布兰奇（Todd Blanche）和当时担任司法部官员的埃米尔-博夫（Emil Bove）法官。【原文：The Trump administration identified top US officials involved in the decision not to turn around planes of deported migrants in March per a judge’s order, including Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem, Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche, and Judge Emil Bove, who was a Justice Department official at the time.】

item.title: 马来西亚数据中心枢纽因水资源担忧收紧审批
item.description: 柔佛州是马来西亚新兴的地区数据中心枢纽，当局正在提高新项目的标准，以遏制因大量用水而导致当地供水紧张的情况。【原文：Johor, the Malaysian state emerging as a regional data center hub, is raising the bar for new projects as authorities seek to curb the heavy water use that’s straining local supplies.】

item.title: 乐天和现代将合并部分石化部门以应对供应过剩
item.description: 乐天化学（Lotte Chemical）和现代化学（HD Hyundai Chemical）同意合并其部分石脑油裂解设施，因为韩国顶级石化产品生产商正在应对长期供应过剩和利润率下降的问题。【原文：Lotte Chemical and HD Hyundai Chemical agreed to combine part of their naphtha-cracking facilities as South Korea’s top petrochemicals producers respond to a prolonged oversupply and weakening margins.】

item.title: 中国需求强劲，香港房屋租金创新高
item.description: 由于新移民的需求抵消了更广泛的房地产衰退，香港住宅租金创下历史新高。【原文：Hong Kong residential rents hit a record high as demand from new arrivals to the city offsets a wider real estate downturn.】

item.title: 本地虾在非美国市场觅得买家，印度海鲜出口商股票受关注
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国白银库存下滑给火热市场带来新风险
item.description: 在中国白银库存降至十年来最低后，全球白银市场面临着新的风险，最近大量白银被运往伦敦，以缓解银价创纪录的挤压。【原文：The global silver market faces a fresh risk after Chinese stockpiles sank to the lowest in a decade, with a huge volume recently shipped to London to ease a squeeze that drove prices to a record.】

item.title: 韩国正密切关注投机性单边韩元走势，必要时将作出严厉回应
item.description: 韩国财政部长表示，当局正密切关注任何投机性的单边货币走势，这表明在韩元接近七个月低点之际，韩国已做好采取行动的准备。【原文：South Korea’s finance minister said authorities are closely monitoring any speculative, one-sided currency moves, underscoring the country’s readiness to act as the won trades near a seven-month low.】

item.title: 中国 "坚决反对 "零或负铜处理费
item.description: 一位高级官员周三表示，中国 "坚决反对 "对铜产业征收零或负的处理费和精炼费。【原文：China “firmly opposes” zero or negative treatment and refining charges for the copper industry, a senior official said on Wednesday.】
